scripts.add-repos-from-blueprint: node blueprint.js repos | xargs -I {} npm run add-repo {}
scripts.sync: npm run add-repos-from-blueprint && npm install --force && npm run build && npm run open-errors
scripts.build: lerna run build.tsc && lerna run build.resolve-paths
scripts.open-errors: if [ -f errors.log ]; then open errors.log || xdg-open errors.log; fi
